choices: This story sucks. I want a new one.
1.content:
This story will be somewhat like an AU (Alternate Universe) where you follow frisk as they travel through the underground, or the first fallen human Chara and see how they lived there life with the Dreemurr family.

Either route you chose, the key difference here is that they will be a lot taller than there canon counterparts. They will also be thirteen for context of age.

Now chose who to follow (and there gender) and we can get this story started.
1.title: The fallen (and giant) human.

11.content: Okay, now you can chose which “morality path” you wish to take.
11.title: Giant Frisk

12.content: Okay, now you can chose which “morality path” you wish to take.
12.title: Giantess Frisk

choices: Down right evil. (But not to obvious)
13.content:
So you wish to follow chara’s life with the Dreemurr family, very good.

But what is his “morality” like in this story?
13.title: Giant Chara

14.content:
So you wish to follow chara’s life with the Dreemurr family, very good.

But what is her “morality” like in this story?
14.title: Giantess Chara

15.content:
WHAT?!

We literally just started!

And now you want a new one!?

You might as well chose one of the other stories on this site, cause I'm not changing a thing!

(FYI, this chapter serves no purpose. I'm also very lazy.)
15.title: This story sucks. I want a new one.

info.brief_description: The last (and first) human that falls into the underground is a lot taller than normal.
info.description: Just one rule, only Frisk and Chara can be the giants/giantess. They can also grow, preferably not to fast. (And frisk can talk to, if you want them to.) Other than that, go nuts.
